title: Beautiful studio--ALL utilities included--near Broadway, downtown!
map_address: 1736 Belmont Avenue near E. Howell Street
posting_body: Great apartment in a beautiful brick building on Capitol Hill.
Located at 1736 Belmont Avenue, it is convenient to both Broadway and downtown.
Nearby buses go to city center, the U District, Northgate, and Redmond.
This spacious unit has large windows and good light.
It also has an eat-in kitchen and a large walk-in closet.
ALL utilities--heat, electricity, and w/s/g--are included!
There is a laundry room and a bicycle room on the premises.
with questions or to schedule a viewing.
And for more pictures, visit <URL> and click on The Granada.
